casebody.data:
State ex rel. Guest
v.
Husted 2018-0889 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. On relator's motion to expedite case schedule. Motion granted. Respondents shall file their answers no later than Wednesday, July 11, 2018, relator shall file her merit brief and evidence no later than Monday, July 16, 2018, respondents shall file their merit briefs and evidence no later than Wednesday, July 25, 2018, and relator may file a reply brief no later than Wednesday, August 1, 2018.
